content:
Diagnosis:
Metastatic pancreatic adenocarcinoma with liver metastases
FGFR1 amplification positive

Previous treatment:
Cycle 1-4 FOLFIRINOX completed March 2024
Cycle 1-2 Pemigatinib completed May 2024

Current medications:
Pemigatinib 13.5mg daily
Creon 25,000 units with meals
Oxycodone MR 20mg BD

Current situation:
Pre cycle 3 Pemigatinib review

CT scan 01 June 2024 shows stable disease in pancreatic primary and liver metastases

CA19-9 trending down from 1200 to 450

I reviewed [redacted name] today prior to cycle 3 Pemigatinib. Performance status remains 1. Weight has stabilized at 72kg. Appetite improving with pancreatic enzyme replacement. Liver function tests remain within normal range. Phosphate 0.82 maintained with supplementation. No ocular toxicity. The plan is to continue with cycle 3 today at full dose. Next CT scan due after cycle 4. Follow up arranged in 3 weeks with blood tests including phosphate monitoring.

cancer_timeline.value: CT scan shows stable disease in pancreatic primary and liver metastases

patient_facts.value: Liver function tests within normal range

status_updates.value: Metastatic pancreatic cancer with liver metastases showing stable disease on Pemigatinib therapy with improving tumor markers
Stable disease on imaging with decreasing CA19-9
Continuing Pemigatinib 13.5mg daily at full dose
Review in 3 weeks with blood tests including phosphate monitoring
